amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to enter into contracts with individuals or entities convicted of fraud.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 22 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to enter into contracts with individuals convicted of fraud.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Grayson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
